SEARCH
Package model

Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
model.Appointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Appointment extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a request for an appointment in the Hospital Management System (HMS). It includes information about the appointment, the doctor, patient, timeslot, status prescription status, diagnosis, service type and note.
Since:
2024-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hoo Jing Huan, Lim Wee Keat, Tan Wen Rong

  • Constructor Details

    • Appointment

      public Appointment(LocalDate date, TimeSlot time, Doctor doctor, Patient patient)
      Constructs an Appointment object with a given date, time slot, doctor, and patient. The appointment status is set to PENDING by default, and the timeslot is marked as occupied.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the appointment
      time - The time slot of the appointment
      doctor - The doctor assigned to the appointment
      patient - The patient scheduled for the appointment

    • getPrescriptions

      public ArrayList<Medication> getPrescriptions()
      Retrieves the list of medications prescribed in this appointment. If there are no prescriptions, a message is displayed.
      Returns:
      The list of prescribed medications or null if no prescriptions
